messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Digest Number 80
messages.msgSnippet: Man you guys have me laughing today!!! The peeing on the chickens thing....oh my GOSH, it s a good thing I don t drink anything near the computer! It reminds
messages.messageBody:
Man you guys have me laughing today!!!
The peeing on the chickens thing....oh my GOSH, it's a good thing I don't
drink anything near the computer!
It reminds me of a story my Mom read my boys called "Harris and me" by Gary
Paulsen....she has no hang ups about poop and pee jokes. In fact she's
usually the first to introduce weird, scary, funny and rude information to my
kids, which they love.
In the book, one of the boys pees on the electric fence....you can imagine
the humor in THAT!
From the stories my dh tells, I'm quite sure that boys try peeing on a lot of
things I never dreamed of, including each other.
I've found that the trick to keeping the toilet area clean is to teach boys
to sit down to pee. Yes, they really will....most of the time anyway. I'm
sure that sounds strange, but they like to play gameboy or read so it works
well for all of us!! LOL
Ren
